result.execSummary:
The defendant Cody W Watson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cody W Watson

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Marisa. 
Case Called: 11:16 am 
INCLUDES 17CF1161, 16CF367, 14CF320, AND 14CF1062. 
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence; Def appears in person, in custody with Atty Pauline Toulouse. 

PLEA HEARING IN 17CF1161. 
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. VRCW. 
State moves to: 
Ct. 2 (Felony BJ)>>D&RI. 
Ct. 3 (Felony BJ)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 
PLEA: Ct. 1 (Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense))>>NO CONTEST. 
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 

MOTION TO REVOKE DEOJ IN 16CF367 AND 14CF320. 
State moves to: 
In 16CF367: Ct. 1 (Felony BJ/Repeater)>>REVOKE DEOJ AND ENTER JUDGMENT. 
In 14CF320: Ct. 1 (2nd Degree SA of Child)>>REVOKE DEOJ AND ENTER JUDGMENT. 
COURT grants above and enters judgment on those counts. 

SENTENCING/SENTENCING AFTER REVOCATION IN ALL FILES. 

COURT ORDERS: 
In 17CF1161: Ct. 1>>SWH for 3 years probation - CONDITIONS: absolute sobriety from controlled substances except for prescriptions taken as prescribed and with prior agent authorization; no driving without valid dl; AODA and follow through; Sex Offender Treatment as deemed appropriate by the dept; assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; no contact with females under the age of 18 unless deemed appropriate by the dept; comply with sex offender registry for life; DNA sample/surcharge; CC. 

In 16CF367: Ct. 1>>SWH for 3 years probation - CONDITIONS:  absolute sobriety from controlled substances except for prescriptions taken as prescribed and with prior agent authorization; no driving without valid dl; AODA and follow through; Sex Offender Treatment as deemed appropriate by the dept; assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; no contact with females under the age of 18 unless deemed appropriate by the dept; comply with sex offender registry for life; DNA sample/surcharge; CC. 

In 14CF320: Ct. 1>>SWH for 5 years probation - CONDITIONS:  absolute sobriety from controlled substances except for prescriptions taken as prescribed and with prior agent authorization; no driving without valid dl; AODA and follow through; Sex Offender Treatment as deemed appropriate by the dept; assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; no contact with females under the age of 18 unless deemed appropriate by the dept; comply with sex offender registry for life; DNA sample/surcharge; CC. 

                    : Ct. 2>>90 days MCJ with huber for work/school/treatment if def qualifies. 

In 14CF1062: Ct. 1>>9 months MCJ with huber for work/school/treatment if def qualifies. 
                      : Ct. 2>>6 months MCJ with huber for work/school/treatment if def qualifies. 
                      : Ct. 3>>30 days MCJ with huber for work/school/treatment if def qualifies. 
                      : Ct. 4>>9 months MCJ with huber for work/school/treatment if def qualifies. 
                      : UNPAID FINANCIAL OBLIGATIONS CONVERTED TO CIVIL JUDGMENT. 

COURT ORDERS all sentences to run CONCURRENT to each other. 
COURT finds the def entitled to jail credit as follows: 
In 17CF1161>>102 days. 
In 16CF367>>NO CREDIT. 
In 14CF320>>185 days. 
In 14CF1062>>140 days credit. 
Adj: 11:36 am

bond refunded - surety withdrawn
Ineligible Voting Notice & Acknowledgment
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief (includes 14CF320, filed in 14CF1062)

Case called: 3:11pm. INCLUDES 14CF320, 14CF1062. Clerk: Denise. State appears by ADA Theresa Wetzsteon. Defendant appears by Atty Julie Sawyer. *VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves for leave of the Crt to file Amended Information in both matters - COURT grants. PLEA: GUILTY - Amend ct 1 (sexual assault of child under 16 yrs of age); Amend ct 2 (dc) 14CF320; amend ct 1 (bj/felony); amend ct 2 (poss thc); amend ct 3 (poss drug para); 
amend ct 4 (bj/misd)14CF1062.Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty on amend ct 2 14CF320 & cts 1-4 in 14CF1062 and deferred on amend ct 1 14CF320. Statements by State. 
COURT ORDERS: 14CF320- amend ct 1 (sexual assault of child under 16 yrs of age) - DEOJ 3 yrs. Crt adopts & signs Deferred Entry of Judgment. 
COURT ORDERS: 14CF320 amend ct 2 & 14CF1062 amend cts 1 -4 - SWH - 3 yrs probation, concurrent. CONDITIONS: Psycho Sexual Evaluation & follow recommendation; AODA & follow through with assessment; Counseling; Good faith effort to obtain and maintain fulltime employment and/or school (not less then 30 hrs per week) and if not must complete 2 verifiable job contacts per week; Absolute Sobriety - Drugs & Alcohol; May have prescribed drugs within the prescription and with the authorization of agent; Random UA's; Court Costs; DNA Surcharge per file. 
COURT FURTHER ORDERS sex registration not required unless Deferred Entry is revoked. Credit of 75 days in 14CF320 and Credit of 30 days in 14CF1062 in the even of any revocation. Atty Sawyer makes statement re: money to be returned or applied to court costs. No objection by State. COURT ORDERS: $80.00 cash in 14CF320 to be applied to Court Costs. COURT ORDERS: $500.00 Cash bond in 14CF1062 to be returned to the Surety, B.R. 
State and Defense make statement re: bond on deferred in 14CF320 amend ct 1. COURT ORDERS: Bond modified in 14CF320 - $5,000 Signature Bond with standard conditions and Nonwaivable contact with R.M.D. dob 10/1/98. DATES: Review Hearing - 1/19/2018 @ 10:45am. BR 3. Adjourned: 3:43pm.
